other_tests.findings: Consistent with complete remission, with no evidence of recurrent leukemia
Pathological examination revealed hyphae with septations, consistent with invasive aspergillus infection
Thin, foamy secretions in the left and right bronchi, with mild, diffuse airway erythema

other_tests.changes_over_time: Positive results received late on the first hospital day

other_tests.findings: Viral load of 450,000 adenovirus DNA copies per milliliter
other_tests.changes_over_time: After treatment with cidofovir, subsequent levels showed a reduction to less than 190 copies per milliliter
